document_data.name: Mount Sarengard
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Sarengard''' was one of the tallest peaks in the eastern [[Marching Mountains]]. It was the location of the holiest site to [[Vhaeraun]].
document_data.Description: Sarengard was located in the far east of the Marching Mountains, east of [[Minthrux Vale]].
document_data.Notable Locations: A mile below the mountain in a 1,000-foot cavern, the [[Vault of Cloaked Midnight]] was found. It was the holiest temple to Vhaeraun in the [[Forgotten Realms|Realms]]. The entrance was in the lower slopes of the mountain.
document_data.Notable Inhabitants: [[Shangalar the Black]] lived in an inverted pyramid balancing 200 feet above the plateau between Minthrux Vale and the summit of Mount Sarengard.
